page.title: 04Education in East Huntspill
page.content: School clubs take place after school. There are football,netball,music, drama,and cricket clubs and up to 15 children stay to take part.Thirty_ three children stay for school lunch, 6 go home for lunch and 35 stay for sandwiches.A school lunch costs 69p for a junior and 59p for an infant.The lunches are cooked in the school kitchen.There are some big school events during the year such as harvest service,Christmas service, parties, disco's, June Fayre,sports day, school matches, and area sports.These events enrich the education of the pupils.
